_comments.darkening_factor: Overall brightness (0.2-0.5). Default 0.35 preserves road texture
_comments.gamma: Gamma correction (1.8-3.0). Default 2.2 prevents crushing detail
_comments.headlight_enabled: Enable intelligent headlight detection and placement
_comments.streetlight_enabled: Enable infrastructure pole detection for lights
_comments.ground_reflection_enabled: Enable ground reflections on damp surfaces
_comments.lens_flare_enabled: Enable subtle lens flare around lights
_comments.detect_vehicles: Auto-detect vehicles for intelligent headlight placement
